channel.title: R.I.P fagex
channel.description:
today i tryed to go to fagex to download movies, games, e books, etc and i see that juanny has PERMANENTLY closed fagex :eek: i think that was the 2nd best forum around after mopar ;) but oh well. rip fagex
For the pass few months we been having tons of trouble with hosting and the attacks, due to that and personal life issues i been ignoring because of fagex i have no other choice but to close fagex for good. This isnt a publicity stunt or a way to gain anything its just how it goes sometimes, Jagex doesn't have anything to do with this I'm not scared of them they can suck my dick, fagex could open back up one day but its future doesn't look good. P.S. There are some people emailing users of fagex giving out a phony Fagex Autofighter thats strapped with a keylogger so make sure you scan files before opening them. - Juanny

item.title: R.I.P fagex
item.dc:creator: @yuhaiyang1 yuhaiyang1
item.description:
@yuhaiyang1 wrote:

W I N N E R:

Fagex was the best community in my eyes (not saying mopar isnt:P) but i liked it there it was very well established and had everything you needed. Shame juan will not give anyone the files for it so it can be re hosted by someone else =\

juann got my to hosts some of the movies pm me if you want the link

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P fagex
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

Fagex is online for now there has been alot of news on what happen which is still coming in.

Fagex will no longer be accepting new users. Sorry

Inactive users/non posting/non logging in users will be deleted soon.

PLEASE NOTE:

THIS DOES NOT MEAN FAGEX WILL BE STAYING UP

Oh well, I really hope it stays up a while.

Read full topic
